bpp/descriptor.name: Nivea Shop
bpp/descriptor.short_desc: Buy Nivea Skin care, Lip Care Products at Best Prices in India — NIVEA Shop
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Welcome to Nivea Shop for ultimate skin care products. Browse our selection of skincare, lip care, and body care products for nourished and moisturized skin

descriptor.name: Nivea Shop
descriptor.short_desc: Buy Nivea Skin care, Lip Care Products at Best Prices in India — NIVEA Shop
descriptor.long_desc: Welcome to Nivea Shop for ultimate skin care products. Browse our selection of skincare, lip care, and body care products for nourished and moisturized skin

descriptor.name: Body Lotion - Aloe Hydration (Normal skin) |  400ml
descriptor.short_desc:
Gift your skin the goodness of NIVEA Aloe Hydration Body Lotion for all day long smooth skin. Enriched with aloe vera extracts, it soothes dry and irritated skin and leaves you with comfortable, soft skin.
Benefits:

Gift your skin the goodness of NIVEA Aloe Hydration bodylotion for all day long smooth skin

Long Lasting Hydration - The NIVEA deep moisture serum gives you smoother skin
Soothes Skin - The aloe extract relieves dry and irritated skin

How to use:

Step 1 - Dispense the body lotion into the palm of your hand Step 2 - Gently massage the lotion onto your skin Step 3 - Apply evenly all over the body Step 4 - Use daily to give your skin the perfect results
Special Ingredients:
Aloe Vera
Other Ingredients:
Aqua, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat. (4.80% [v/v]), Dicaprylyl Ether, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Dimethicone, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Linalool, Citronellol, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Geraniol, Perfume
descriptor.long_desc:

descriptor.name: Body Lotion - Oil in Lotion Rose & Argan Oil (Dry Skin) |  400ml
descriptor.short_desc:
I ndulge in the goodness of natural oils in a fast absorbing lotion with the new NIVEA Oil In Lotion Rose & Argan Oil. The precious natural ingredients and caring oils are blended into a unique lotion that gets quickly absorbed into the skin. The natural oils give you moisturized skin for up to 24 hours with a floral Rose fragrance.

Benefits:

Long Lasting Moisturisation - The formula enriched with natural oils gives you moisturized skin for up to 24 hours
Quick Absorption - The Argan oil is carefully blended in fast absorbing lotion
Delicate Fragrance - The unique lotion has a pleasing floral fragrance of Rose

How to use:

Dispense the body lotion into the palm of your hand
Gently massage the lotion onto your skin
Apply evenly all over the body
Use daily to give your skin the perfect results

Special Ingredients:
Argan Oil
Other Ingredients:
Aqua, Glycerin, Isopropyl Palmitate, Alcohol Denat., Glyceryl Stearate SE, Dimethicone, Carbomer, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Sodium Hydroxide, Trisodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Linalool, Geraniol, Citronellol, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Coumarin, Perfume

Delicate Fragrance - The unique lotion has a pleasing floral fragrance of Rose

descriptor.short_desc:
Gift your skin the goodness of NIVEA aloe protection body lotion SPF15 for all day long smooth skin. Enriched with aloe vera extracts, it soothes dry and irritated skin and leaves you with comfortable, soft skin.

Gift your skin the goodness of NIVEA Aloe Hydration Body Lotion for all day long smooth skin
Long Lasting Hydration - The NIVEA deep moisture serum gives you smoother skin

SPF 15 gives your skin sun protection and prevents sun damage

How to use:

descriptor.name: Body Lotion- Oil in Lotion Cocoa Nourish (Very Dry Skin) |  400ml
descriptor.short_desc:
Smoothen away dry skin with the new NIVEA Oil In Lotion Cocoa Nourish. A formula with the goodness of cocoa butter and coconut oil, it provides deep nourishment to your skin while keeping it smooth all day long. Its unique formula with deep moisture serum also gets absorbed quickly into the skin and provides moisturization for up to 48 hours.
Benefits:

Long Lasting Moisturisation - The deep moisture serum formula gives you moisturized skin for upto 48 hours.
Gives You Smoother Skin - Get smooth skin that is deeply moisturized.
Deep Nourishment - Leaves your skin feeling deeply nourished and soft.

How to use:

Dispense the body lotion into the palm of your hand
Gently massage the lotion onto your skin
Apply evenly all over the body

Use daily to give your skin the perfect results

Special Ingredients:
Cocoa Butter & Coconut
Other Ingredients:
Aqua, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Isohexadecane, Isopropyl Palmitate, Paraffinum Liquidum, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, Theobroma Cacao Seed Butter, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glyceryl Glucoside, Carbomer, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Trisodium EDTA, Ethylparaben, Methylparaben, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Perfume, Ethylhexylglycerin, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Coumarin, BHT, C15-19 Alkane
descriptor.long_desc:
Smoothen away dry skin with the new NIVEA Oil In Lotion Cocoa Nourish. A formula with the goodness of cocoa butter and coconut oil, it provides deep nourishment to your skin while keeping it smooth all day long. Its unique formula with deep moisture serum also gets absorbed quickly into the skin and provides moisturization for up to 48 hours.
Benefits:

Long Lasting Moisturisation - The deep moisture serum formula gives you moisturized skin for upto 48 hours.
Gives You Smoother Skin - Get smooth skin that is deeply moisturized.

descriptor.name: Body Lotion- Nourishing Body Milk (Very Dry Skin) |  400ml
descriptor.short_desc:
Say hello to deeply moisturized skin with the new NIVEA Nourishing Lotion Body Milk with deep moisture serum. This rich and creamy formula with 2 times more almond oil deeply moisturizes and softens your dry skin. The lotion gives you deep moisturization for up to 48 hours after a single application.

Benefits:

Long Lasting Moisturisation - The deep moisture serum formula gives you moisturized skin for upto 48 hours
Gives You Smoother Skin - Get smooth skin that is deeply moisturized
Reduces Roughness Of Skin - The nourishing almond oil repairs very dry skin

How to use:

Step 1 - Dispense the body lotion into the palm of your hand. Step 2 - Gently massage the lotion onto your skin. Step 3 - Apply evenly all over the body. Step 4 - Use daily to give your skin the perfect results.

Special Ingredients:
Almond Oil
Other Ingredients:
Aqua, Paraffinum Liquidum, C15-19 Alkane, Alcohol Denat. (3.66% [v/v]), Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Glyceryl Glucoside, Methylparaben, Carbomer, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Maris Sal, Linalool, Citronellol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Limonene, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Perfume

Benefits:

Gives You Smoother Skin - Get smooth skin that is deeply moisturized

Gives You Smoother Skin - Get smooth skin that is deeply moisturized

descriptor.name: 42K Roll on Pack of 3
descriptor.short_desc:
Men's Deodorant Roll On - 42K (Pack of 3)
Marathons are the ultimate test of endurance. Sweat it out without smelling of it, with a deodorant that's marathon-tough. Prepare for your runs with the power of Silver-ions Technology, a caring formula that's mild on the skin yet effective against body odour. It uses Active Silver Ions to deactivate and reduce up to 99.9% of the odour-causing bacteria which reacts with sweat to cause malodour. This way, you end every run smelling of victory, and nothing else.
Benefits:

Provides a modern masculine scent
Reduces upto 99.9% of odour causing bacteria
Mild formula for skin that is effective against body odour
Anti-persipirant deodorant care for your underarms
Formula uses Silver Ions Technology to control odour causing bacteria on skin

How to use:
Step 1 - Uncap the Roll On bottle Step 2 - Roll it directly on the underarms and allow it to dry Step 3 - Stay fresh all day long
descriptor.long_desc:
Men's Deodorant Roll On - 42K (Pack of 3)
Marathons are the ultimate test of endurance. Sweat it out without smelling of it, with a deodorant that's marathon-tough. It uses Active Silver Ions to deactivate and reduce up to 99.9% of the odour-causing bacteria which reacts with sweat to cause malodour. This way, you end every run smelling of victory, and nothing else.

descriptor.name: Bio Aloe Vera Deodorant | 75 ml - Naturally Good - MYOC
descriptor.short_desc:
NIVEA's Naturally Good range of Deodorants and Roll-Ons contain 95% ingredients of natural origin, and 5% essential ingredients for formula stability, protection, and safety.
Benefits:

Gives natural freshness all day long
Has a pleasant fresh fragrance

How To Use:

Hold the can 10-15 cms away
Spray directly on underarm and all over body
Do not spray on broken or irritated skin
Allow product to dry completely
Apply on Skin for best results

Ingredients:
Alcohol Denat. 66 % with Tertiary Butyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Alcohol, Aqua, Glycerin, Parfum, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Polyglyceryl-2 Caprate.

Ingredients:
Aqua, Alcohol Denat., Glycerin, Parfum, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Polyglyceryl-2 Caprate.
descriptor.long_desc:
NIVEA's Naturally Good range of Deodorants and Roll-Ons contain 95% ingredients of natural origin, and 5% essential ingredients for formula stability, protection, and safety.
Benefits:

Gives natural freshness all day long
Has a pleasant fresh fragrance

How To Use:

Take the cap off the roll-on bottle.
Apply directly on your underarms and allow it to dry.
Stay odour-free all day long

Ingredients:
Aqua, Alcohol Denat., Glycerin, Parfum, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Polyglyceryl-2 Caprate.

descriptor.name: 42K Deo - Pack of 3
descriptor.short_desc:
Men's Deodorant - 42K
Marathons are the ultimate test of endurance. Sweat it out without smelling of it, with a roll-on that's marathon-tough. Run to the finish line with the power of Silver-ions Technology. a caring formula that's mild on the skin but tough on body odour. It uses Active Silver Ions to work against and reduce up to 99.9% of odour-causing bacteria which reacts with sweat to cause malodour. End your runs sweating like a champion without ever smelling of body odour.
descriptor.long_desc:
Men's Deodorant - 42K
Marathons are the ultimate test of endurance. Sweat it out without smelling of it, with a roll-on that's marathon-tough. Run to the finish line with the power of Silver-ions Technology. a caring formula that's mild on the skin but tough on body odour. It uses Active Silver Ions to work against and reduce up to 99.9% of odour-causing bacteria which reacts with sweat to cause malodour. End your runs sweating like a champion without ever smelling of body odour.
